content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols **materials** * japanese size 7/0 crochet hook 4 0mm * color a approx 120g 220 meters * color b approx 100g 183 33 meters * color c approx 50g 91 67 meters **note ** this bathmat is crocheted with two strands held together 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/27ss/g756-1 pdf
